ResumeParserData.Experience: Santander UK  Performance Analyst  August 2019 - Present  Manchester, UK  At Santander, I analyze business performance data to support strategic decision-making. My responsibilities include gathering and processing performance metrics using SQL and Excel, generating detailed reports, and presenting insights to senior management. I collaborate with various departments to identify performance improvement opportunities and develop strategies to enhance business operations. I also lead process improvement projects, resulting in streamlined workflows and increased efficiency.  HSBC UK  Junior Performance Analyst  June 2017 - July 2019  Manchester, UK  In my role as a Junior Performance Analyst at HSBC, I supported senior analysts in monitoring and analyzing business performance. My tasks included preparing performance reports, conducting data validation, and assisting in the development of performance improvement plans. I worked closely with stakeholders to ensure performance data accuracy and provided actionable insights that informed business strategies. Additionally, I participated in process improvement initiatives to enhance performance management processes.
